content.question: In his installation A Book from the Sky, Xu Bing referenced which of the following traditional Chinese art forms in order to comment on the political and cultural context of twentieth-century Chinese society?

choices.label: Silk screens painted with watercolor and ink
Propagandist posters depicting historical Chinese leaders
Hand-bound books and scrolls printed with woodblock
Wall hangings showing monumental calligraphic characters

content.answer: Hand-bound books and scrolls printed with woodblock
